ADD_LIBRARY(Core 
  MainWindow.cpp
  PreferencesDialog.cpp
  DocumentHandler.cpp
)

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(Core PUBLIC 
  ${VTK_LIBRARIES}
  Qt${QT_VERSION_MAJOR}::Widgets
  Qt${QT_VERSION_MAJOR}::Core
  Qt${QT_VERSION_MAJOR}::Xml
  Defaults
  GraphicalUtils
  Rendering
  Widgets
)

TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(Core PUBLIC
    ${PRJ_SOURCE_DIR}/src/UserInterface/Core
    ${PRJ_SOURCE_DIR}/src/UserInterface/Defaults
)

# Autogenerated uic files
if(WIN32)
TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(Core INTERFACE 
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/Core_autogen/include_Release
)
else()
TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(Core INTERFACE 
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/Core_autogen/include
)
endif()
